statements: SELECT * FROM refugee_demographics WHERE age > 20;
SELECT name, age FROM refugee_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT country_of_origin, COUNT(*) as total_count FROM refugee_demographics GROUP BY country_of_origin;
SELECT * FROM refugee_demographics WHERE location = 'Camp A' AND age < 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, gender FROM refugee_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 AND country_of_origin = 'Syria';
SELECT name, age, gender, country_of_origin FROM refugee_demographics WHERE age >= 18;
SELECT * FROM refugee_demographics WHERE location = 'Camp A' AND age < 30;
SELECT id, name, gender FROM refugee_demographics WHERE country_of_origin IN ('Syria', 'Somalia', 'Iraq') ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM refugee_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT country_of_origin FROM refugee_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT * FROM RefugeeDemographics;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM RefugeeDemographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT country_of_origin, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM RefugeeDemographics GROUP BY country_of_origin;
SELECT * FROM RefugeeLocations WHERE population > 10000;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM RefugeeLocations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM RefugeeDemographics ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM RefugeeLocations WHERE population > 10000 ORDER BY population DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT country_of_origin, COUNT(*) AS total_refugees FROM RefugeeDemographics GROUP BY country_of_origin ORDER BY total_refugees DESC;
SELECT name, gender, location_name FROM RefugeeDemographics JOIN RefugeeLocations ON RefugeeDemographics.id = RefugeeLocations.location_id WHERE population > 5000 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, age, gender, status FROM RefugeeDemographics WHERE status = 'asylum' OR status = 'refugee' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM refugee_demographics;
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, age FROM refugee_demographics WHERE age > 25;
SELECT nationality, gender FROM refugee_demographics WHERE nationality = 'Syrian';
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE city = 'Berlin';
SELECT country, city, region FROM location_data WHERE country = 'Germany';
SELECT id, first_name, last_name, age, nationality, gender, ethnicity FROM refugee_demographics;
SELECT * FROM refugee_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY nationality ASC;
SELECT r.first_name, r.last_name, l.city, l.region, a.analysis_date FROM refugee_demographics r JOIN analysis_data a ON r.id = a.refugee_id JOIN location_data l ON a.location_id = l.location_id;
SELECT nationality, COUNT(*) AS count FROM refugee_demographics GROUP BY nationality HAVING count > 1 ORDER BY count DESC;
SELECT r.*, a.analysis_result FROM refugee_demographics r JOIN analysis_data a ON r.id = a.refugee_id WHERE a.analysis_result LIKE '%Positive%';
SELECT * FROM refugee_demographics WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY country_of_origin ASC;
SELECT country_of_origin, gender FROM refugee_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM refugee_locations WHERE country = 'Syria';
SELECT * FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_type = 'Health' AND analysis_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT camp_name, capacity, current_population FROM refugee_camps ORDER BY current_population DESC;
SELECT * FROM refugee_demographics WHERE age > 18;
SELECT country_of_origin, age, gender, occupation FROM refugee_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM refugee_locations WHERE country = 'Syria';
SELECT * FROM analysis_results ORDER BY analysis_date DESC, analysis_type;
SELECT camp_name, capacity, current_population FROM refugee_camps WHERE capacity > current_population;
SELECT * FROM refugees;
SELECT name, age, country_of_residence FROM refugees;
SELECT gender, country_of_origin FROM refugees ORDER BY gender ASC;
SELECT * FROM refugee_locations WHERE region='Europe';
SELECT institution, completion_year FROM refugee_education WHERE completion_year > 2015;
SELECT * FROM refugees WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, country_of_origin FROM refugees WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT r.name, re.level, rh.medical_condition FROM refugees r JOIN refugee_education re ON r.id = re.refugee_id JOIN refugee_health rh ON r.id = rh.refugee_id WHERE rh.treatment_status = 'Ongoing';
SELECT re.level, re.institution, re.completion_year FROM refugee_education re WHERE re.completion_year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY re.completion_year DESC;

SELECT rh.medical_condition, rh.treatment_status, re.level, re.institution FROM refugee_health rh JOIN refugee_education re ON rh.refugee_id = re.refugee_id WHERE rh.treatment_start_date >= '2021-01-01';
